Economic values are missing Education values are missing Intelehealth is a telemedicine application that connects health workers in rural and remote areas with remote doctors so they can provide high quality health services for their patients. Sila is a telemedicine application that connects health workers in rural and remote areas with remote doctors so they can provide high quality health services for their patients. Telemedicine app makes specialist doctor consultations available to the rural populations coming to primary healthcare . It helps in saving patients from traveling miles for healthcare. \n\n Telemedicine app allows Health Officers to collect detailed patient complaints and symptoms and generates a comprehensive clinical case history. The app also allows them to capture details of previous medications, diagnostics, prescriptions and treatment.

The following sections are for clinical visits, for social visits, submit/ swipe right until the end of the sections to reach the note page Swipe to the right to move forward Fill required fields Home Page For aid visits, you may skip the Past Medical History For aid visits, you may skip the Family History For aid visits, you may skip the Vitals Skip Enter data Patient Information Name Reason of Visit Medication Plan General Instructions
Please add the details Doctor has not given prescription. Please wait for prescription to end the visit. If wanted to exit the visit without losing the data, please select \"no\" and then choose \"return to patient details or home page\". Continuing with this step will end the visit and prevent entering any additional information. If the data has not been uploaded to the server, then the visit will not be recorded in the patient\'s chart.
//aid order Aid Order Type 1. Medical Equipment Loan: Type 2. Free Medical Equipment: Type 3. Cover Medication Expenses: Type 4. Cover Surgical Expenses: Type 5. Cash Assistance:
